data.source: Of 444 patients, 76% were male.

subsentences.sentence: of 444 patients , 76% were male .

data.source: They had a mean age of 69 ± 10 years and LVEF of 28.2 ± 6.7%.

subsentences.sentence: they had a mean age of 69 ± 10 years and lvef of 28.2 ± 6.7% .

data.source: HF was of ischemic etiology in 42% of cases and they were in NYHA class II (47.5%), III (50.0%) or IV (2.5%).

subsentences.sentence: HF was of ischemic etiology in 42% of cases and they were in nyha class ii ( 47.5% ) , iii ( 50.0% ) or iv ( 2 . 5% ) .

data.source: On average, patients were active for 9% of the day (2 h 10 min).

subsentences.sentence: on average , patients were active for 9% of the day ( 2 h 10 min ) .

data.source: The physical activity decreased by approximatively 10% with the onset of the lockdown (figure 1) and recovered within the following eight weeks.

subsentences.sentence: the physical activity decreased by approximatively 10% with the onset of the lockdown ( figure 1 ) and recovered within the following eight weeks .

data.source: Comparison of the 28-days periods before, during and after the lockdown showed a statistically significant intra-individual decrease in physical activity (mean decrease 9 min per day) during the lockdown compared to pre- and post-lockdown values and a trend toward reduced mean heart rates.

subsentences.sentence: comparison of the 28 -days periods before , during and after the lockdown showed a statistically significant intra-individual decrease in physical activity ( mean decrease 9 min per day ) during the lockdown compared to pre- and post-lockdown values and a trend toward reduced mean heart rates .

data.source: In parallel, a significant increase in device detected atrial arrhythmia burden (mean increase 17 min per day) was observed.

subsentences.sentence: in parallel , a significant increase in device detected atrial arrhythmia burden ( mean increase 17 min per day ) was observed .

data.source: All other parameters did not change significantly.

subsentences.sentence: all other parameters significantly did not change .

data.source: We enrolled 34 consecutive patients with confirmed diagnosis of SARS-CoV-2 (mean age62.45 ± 5.25years, 16male).

subsentences.sentence: we enrolled 34 consecutive patients with confirmed diagnosis of SARS-CoV- 2 ( mean age 62.45 ± 5.25 years , 16 male ) .

data.source: Remote wireless rhythm monitoring was performed using portative ECG sensor.

subsentences.sentence: remote wireless rhythm monitoring was using performed portative ecg sensor .

data.source: Average follow-up period was 21 days during in-hospital stage and 2 months after discharge.

subsentences.sentence: average follow-up period was 21 days during in-hospital stage and 2 months after discharge .

data.source: 3416 consecutive patients were reviewed and 1476 finally enrolled (65.9 ± 20.9 years, 57.3% male).

subsentences.sentence: 3416 consecutive patients were reviewed and 1476 finally enrolled ( 65.9 ± 20.9 years , 57.3% male ) .

data.source: 76 (5.1%) patients had NAEs.

subsentences.sentence: 76 ( 5.1% ) patients had naes .

data.source: Most of them were new atrial fibrillation episodes (48 patients, 3.2%), mostly seen in patients with no previous arrhythmia (38 patients, 79.2%).

subsentences.sentence: most of them were new atrial fibrillation episodes ( 48 patients , 3.2% ) , mostly seen in patients with no previous arrhythmia ( 38 patients , 79.2% ) .

data.source: Atrial flutter (AFL) accounted for 20% of all NAEs.

subsentences.sentence: atrial flutter ( afl ) accounted for 20% of all naes .

data.source: Ventricular arrhythmias were seen in 9 (0.6%) patients.

subsentences.sentence: ventricular arrhythmias were seen in 9 ( 0.6% ) patients .

data.source: Multivariable analysis showed that prior AFL, heart failure, dyslipidaemia, lopinavir/ritonavir, and combined hydroxychloroquine and azithromycin were independently associated with NAEs.

subsentences.sentence: multivariable analysis that showed prior afl , heart failure , dyslipidaemia , lopinavir / ritonavir , and combined hydroxychloroquine and azithromycin independently were associated with naes .

data.source: 66 (86.8%) patients with NAEs died.

subsentences.sentence: 66 ( 86.8% ) patients with naes died .

data.source: The Kaplan-Meier analysis showed a lower survival of patients with NAEs (P < 0.001).

subsentences.sentence: the Kaplan-Meier analysis showed a lower survival of patients with naes ( p < 0.001 ) .

data.source: Eight out of 9 (88.9%) and 41 out of 48 (85.4%) patients with ventricular arrhythmias and atrial fibrillation respectively died.

subsentences.sentence: eight out of 9 ( 88.9% ) and 41 out of 48 ( 85.4% ) patients with ventricular arrhythmias and atrial fibrillation respectively died .

data.source: Older age, male gender and NAEs were independently associated with death.

subsentences.sentence: older age , male gender and naes independently associated with death .

data.source: NAEs and other outcomes, such as heart failure, thromboembolism, and bleeding independently predicted death.

subsentences.sentence: naes and other outcomes , such as heart failure , thromboembolism , and independently bleeding predicted death .
